item.title: Hacking my Kobo Clara HD in 204
item.description: This post is an extension of the great tutorial “Hacking my Kobo Clara HD”, with the some extra details and clarifications from my experience. 1. Installing KOReader This thread has the installation information: link. Search for “One-Click Kobo Packages”, and download the desired package zip (I just did KOReader and Plato) Search for your OS (“Windows”, “macOS”, or “Linux”) and download the “install script archive” and unzip it in the same folder as the package zip.
